windows.title: AI Assist - first release - dragos.nuta@trilogy.com - DevFactory Mail - Google Chrome

uiElements.details: tabs, address bar, bookmarks bar, Gmail navigation pane, Gmail action buttons, email content area

content.title: Email Content
content.visibleText:
Examples of tasks it can handle today:
- write the release notes for Messenger.
- propose a sound go-to-market strategy for the AI Copilot feature of Jive
- compare the tech stack of products X vs Y

What would you want to use it for?

Important Notes
- Underlying Data: AI Assist uses your screenshots as data. Most of you have 1 screenshot per 10 minutes, with some having 3 per 10 minutes.
- How It Works: Your screenshots are converted into text and utilized in an RAG pipeline that employs HyDE.
- Data Coverage: For most users, AI Assist has the last 2-3 weeks of data. If you just added your business email to WorkSmart, it will only start accumulating now.
- Model Options: You can switch it to use GPT-4 or Claude3.
- Limitation: Currently, it does not maintain session history. Each request is handled independently, without connecting to the previous chat history.
- Lag: It takes a few minutes for the latest screenshots to be sent to the backend and indexed. Give it 10-15 minutes.

Share Your Feedback!
Michael and I would love to hear about your experience using AI Assist! Whether it did things right, messed something up, or if there are features you'd like to see, we want to hear it all.

Thank you for being part of this early testing phase. We're looking forward to your insights!

Dragos

- Limitation: Currently, it does not maintain session history. Each request is handled independently, without connecting to the previous chat history.
- Lag: It takes a few minutes for the latest screenshots to be sent to the backend and indexed. Give it 10-15 minutes.

Share Your Feedback!
Michael and I would love to hear about your experience using AI Assist! Whether it did things right, messed something up, or if there are features you'd like to see, we want to hear it all.
